sen.j: 京阪バス1dayチケット（けいはんバスワンディチケット）は、京阪バスの一日乗車券である。
sen.e: Keihan Bus 1 Day Ticket is one day pass for Keihan Bus.
Keihan Bus 1 Day Ticket is a one day pass for Keihan Bus.
Keihan Bus One Day Ticket is a one day pass for Keihan Bus.

sen.j: 京阪バスでは、従来京都地区において『山科醍醐観光一日乗車券』を、大阪府下においては『枚方市内一日乗車券』を発売していたが、大人800円/小児400円と比較的高値であったことや、発売場所が限定されていたため売れ行きが芳しくなかった。
sen.e: Keihan Bus used to sell "Yamashina-Daigo Sightseeing One Day Pass" for Kyoto district, and "Hirakata City One Day Pass" for Osaka Prefecture, but it didn't sell well because it was relatively expensive that 800 yen for adult/ 400 yen for child, also the place for selling were limited.
sen.cmt: 京都→Kyoto『山科醍醐観光一日乗車券』→”Yamashina-Daigo Sightseeing One Day Pass”[定訳不明]大阪府→Osaka Prefecture『枚方市内一日乗車券』→”Hirakata City One Day Pass”[定訳不明]
sen.e: Keihan Bus used to sell "Yamashina-Daigo Sightseeing One Day Pass" for Kyoto district, and "Hirakata City One Day Pass" for Osaka Prefecture, but it didn't sell well because it was relatively expensive at 800 yen for adults/ 400 yen for children, with limited venues selling such tickets.

Keihan Bus used to sell "Yamashina-Daigo Sightseeing One Day Pass" for Kyoto district, and "Hirakata City One Day Pass" for Osaka Prefecture, but it didn't sell well because it was relatively expensive at 800 yen for adults/ 400 yen for children, with limited venues selling such tickets.

sen.j: また、カードリーダーの設置によるカード利用客の増加に伴い、これらの一日乗車券をカード化して発売することになった。
sen.e: Also these one day pass is sold as a card with increase of people who use a card by install of card reader.
Together with the estblishment of a card reader which resulted in increased card users, a card version of the pass was also offered.
Together with the estblishment of a card reader which resulted in increased card users, a card version of the pass was also offered.

sen.j: 京都市内版は『山科醍醐観光一日乗車券』の後継として、大阪府版は『枚方市内一日乗車券』のそれを踏襲しているが、大阪版については利用範囲を大阪府下のほぼすべての路線に範囲を広げている。
sen.e: Edition of Kyoto City is "Yamashina-Daigo Sightseeing One Day Pass" as succession, but edition of Osaka is hesitated to use as "Hirakata City One Day Pass", edition of Osaka is widen the section of usage in almost all of lines in Osaka Prefecture.

The Kyoto City edition "Yamashina-Daigo Sightseeing One Day Pass" is now offered succession, but edition of Osaka is hesitated to use as "Hirakata City One Day Pass", edition of Osaka is widen the section of usage in almost all of lines in Osaka Prefecture.
sen.cmt: Robert: Please ask the translator to redo this
sen.e: The Kyoto City edition "Yamashina-Daigo Sightseeing One Day Pass" is now offered succession, but edition of Osaka is hesitated to use as "Hirakata City One Day Pass," edition of Osaka is widen the section of usage in almost all of lines in Osaka Prefecture.

sen.j: また、京都市内版・大阪版ともに1枚大人500円/小児250円に値下げした。
sen.e: And ticket price was reduced to 500 yen for adult/ 250 yen for child per ticket for edition of Kyoto/ edition of Osaka.
The ticket price was reduced to 500 yen for adults/ 250 yen for children per ticket for the Kyoto/Osaka.
The ticket price was reduced to 500 yen for adults/ 250 yen for children per ticket for the Kyoto/Osaka.

sen.e: November 26, 2004: Edition of Kyoto was sold

sen.j: 2006年4月1日 京阪宇治交通との合併に伴い、大阪版の利用範囲が男山団地地区にも拡大。
sen.e: April 1, 2006: The section of usage was spread to Otokoyama Danchi with merger with Keihan Uji Kotsu.

April 1, 2006: Coverage was spread to include Otokoyama Danchi together with the merger with Keihan Uji Kotsu.

sen.j: 身体障害、知的障害、健康障害の割引適用は現金、定期乗車券、回数乗車券、バスカードと違い適用されない。
sen.e: Discount applied by cash for people with physical disability, mental disability, healthy disability, and it's different from monthly card, bus tickets and bus card, these are not applied.
